item.title: Hello Blogdown!
item.author: tonykuoyj@gmail.com (Yao-Jen Kuo)
item.description: R Code 這是我認為使用 blogdown 套件最棒的功能。 print("Hello R!") ## [1] "Hello R!" summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.:19.0 3rd Qu.: 56.00 ## Max. :25.0 Max. :120.00 R Plot plot(cars) Figure 1: Test
